channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Wrong Way to Build a Nuclear Renaissance
item.description: The real bottleneck to nuclear progress in America isn’t a lack of federal financing.

item.title: Going Soft On Illegal Labor Is A Betrayal Of American Workers Like My Family
item.description: Competitors blew past my parents like they were standing still, mostly thanks to the stream of cheap, illegal labor my parents refused to tap into.

item.title: U.S. Attorney Chased By Illegal Alien With Knife In Albany
item.description: Criminal behavior is what we can expect from people who started their relationship with this country by entering illegally.

item.title: Why Non-Woke Indie Video Games Like Clair Obscur Are Going Gangbusters
item.description: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 presages the fall of woke gaming titans in its own indie gaming moment because it refused to bow to leftist ideology.

item.title: China responds angrily to trade criticisms from EU, other G7 countries
item.description: Chinese officials are rejecting trade complaints from the Group of Seven nations who say Beijing violates trade rules by subsidizing its industries an...

item.title: Team USA Fans Want To Cheer For Red, White, And Blue, Not Pride Rainbows
item.description: Despite an executive order in February opposing male participation in women’s sports, national teams continue to promote transgenderism.

item.title: Saying Goodbye to Julia Alexander
item.description: Memories of an art-world star and cherished friend.

item.title: U.S. Navy Sails To 2025 Recruiting Target Three Months Ahead Of Schedule
item.description: With the wind in its sails, the U.S. Navy hit its recruiting goal for the 2025 fiscal year three months ahead of schedule, the service announced Wedne...

item.title: Trump effect: Study finds 1 million illegal immigrants have left U.S. since January
item.description: President Trump has not only stopped but reversed the Biden border surge, according to early Census Bureau data that suggests hundreds of thousands of...

item.title: Sorry, Democrats: Republican Work Requirements Are Modest — and Empowering
item.description: Able-bodied adults on welfare are capable of lifting up themselves and America. What a shame that Democrats refuse to see it.

item.title: Police attackers, looters charged; IRS probes protest funding in Los Angeles anti-ICE riots
item.description: Los Angeles prosecutors revealed a slew of new charges against rioters who lit police vehicles on fire and looted businesses during the wild protests ...

item.title: Vance joins liberal social media site to unwelcome reception
item.description: Vice President J.D. Vance joined the BlueSky social media platform Wednesday afternoon. Vice President J.D. Vance was suspended from the BlueSky socia...

item.title: The Horseshoe Coalition Against Israel on Iran
item.description: The ‘restrainer’ right and the progressives sound an awful lot alike on Israel and Iran — but they are on the margins.

item.title: What Sports Can Teach America About Swift Justice
item.description: Athletes have a code, one that’s missing on social media and in politics.

item.title: Acting head of civil rights agency defends decisions undercutting transgender workers
item.description: The acting chair of the federal agency that enforces workers rights acknowledged Wednesday that transgender workers are protected under civil rights l...
